question: A High-Level Committee (HLC) under the Union Home Minister has announced additional central assistance from NDRF to how many states?
explanation:
A High-Level Committee (HLC) headed by the Union Home Minister Amit Shah has approved additional Central assistance from the National Disaster Response Fund (NDRF) to 6 States.
The additional assistance from NDRF amounts to Rs.4381 crore and has been approved to states that have been affected by cyclone/ floods/ landslides during this year.
